name: European Pressure Ulcer Advisory Panel
goal:
The European Pressure Ulcer Advisory Panel was established as a charity in 1996 in London to lead and support all European countries in the efforts to prevent and treat pressure ulcers.
The mission of the association is to provide the relief of persons suffering from or at risk of pressure ulcers, in particular through research and the education of the public and by influencing pressure ulcer policy in all European countries towards an adequate patient centred and cost effective pressure ulcer care.

EPUAP has continuously worked on:
- research and education on pressure ulcers
- raising awareness on the importance of prevention and treatment of pressure ulcers
- adequate patient centred and cost effective pressure ulcer care
